LanguageData.BM_SpacerFlashlightUtilityModule.label: flashlight module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerFlashlightUtilityModule.descrip: A high-tech device that can be installed into an ear or any compatible ear replacement. This particular module acts as a compact and portable flashlight which makes sitting around in darkness slightly less upsetting.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerTunenodeUtilityModule.label: tunenode module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerTunenodeUtilityModule.descripti: A high-tech device that can be installed into an ear or any compatible ear replacement. This particular model is equipped with a compact comms array calibrated to receive audio data such as music. The sources of the data often vary, a mix of melodies from ancient satellite constructs, radio stations from neighboring planets and distant glitterworlds creates a very unique listening experience.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerEcholocationUtilityModule.label: echolocation module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerEcholocationUtilityModule.descr: A high-tech device that can be installed into an ear or any compatible ear replacement. This particular module is capable of gathering data through an echolocation-like process and sending it directly to the brain. It is then received in a form of a subconscious understanding of the surrounding area, including objects outside of one's field of view.
